**Repair and Preventative Maintenance of the SynaptXS - Kentville Research and Development Centre**

**Tender Information**

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017394
* **Solicitation Number**: 01B46-22-153
* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-15
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-29T02:00:00 (expired)
* **Procurement Category**: SRVTGD (Repair and Maintenance)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Scope of Work**

The objective of this Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is to issue a service contract for the repair of the SynaptXS and a preventative maintenance (PM) plan with two (2) option years for the Kentville Research and Development Centre (RDC). The contractor will be responsible for the repair and maintenance of the SynaptXS equipment, ensuring optimal performance and minimizing downtime.

**Contracting Entity**

* **Name**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Address**: 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0C5, Canada

**Technical Requirements**

The repair and maintenance work will be performed in accordance with the specifications outlined in the contract documents. The contractor will be expected to maintain a high level of quality and ensure that all work is done in a safe and efficient manner.

**Contact Information**

* **Name**: Claudia Lauzier
* **Email**: [claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 438-455-2392

**Document Attachments**

The tender document can be downloaded from the following link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/fbf1d624eb70b263af6fd3efbb20cb32/pac-acan_22-153_final.pdf> (French only)

**Important Notes**

* The tender closing date has expired, and the tender is no longer open for submission.

* The contracting entity reserves the right to cancel or terminate the contract at any time.
